titleStmt.title: An Account of the manner of taking the Lord Chancellor with the Lord Mayor's speech to the people upon that occasion, December the 12th, 1688.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
This item appears at reel 2:61 as Wing A321 (number cancelled), and at reel 1734:3 as Wing A323A.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
